body_html:
@SsnL Patched in the new data_loader works great, having leaked semaphore problems though. Similar to @vrt1shjwlkr.

I leak about one semaphore per data_loader worker.

/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/semaphore_tracker.py:143: UserWarning: semaphore_tracker: There appear to be 1 leaked semaphores to clean up at shutdown
  len(cache))

body:
@SsnL Patched in the new data_loader works great, having leaked semaphore problems though. Similar to @vrt1shjwlkr.

I leak about one semaphore per data_loader worker.

```
/usr/lib/python3.6/multiprocessing/semaphore_tracker.py:143: UserWarning: semaphore_tracker: There appear to be 1 leaked semaphores to clean up at shutdown
  len(cache))
```
